file_content.text: Who needs to be a Jedi Master? You can be my general anytime, beautiful.
Tough break not getting promoted to Jedi Master. You need to talk about it, let me know.
They promoted you to general, huh? Does that make me a colonel?
Who says you can't have it all? You can be a Jedi Master and still have me on the side.
Now that you're a Jedi Master and all, maybe you can finally give me the time of day. What do you think?
Jedi Master. Sounds good on you. Me, I prefer one-word titles. Snappier. Easier to remember.
Thanks for sending the droid. It was almost like you really cared.
Guess you figured a droid could do what I couldn't, huh? Sure, I understand....
I understand why you didn't come. You like an independent man who can take care of himself. Fine.
I realize you admire my skill, but next time, don't leave me fighting half the Imperial army.
Too bad we can't stay. I was warming up to this place.
I'm calling this party officially over.
Before you go, let me memorize how gorgeous you look. Okay, got it. Go kick the Emperor's tail.
You go save the galaxy. I'll handle the rest of these chumps.
Teeseven said you were in danger.
Have I ever mentioned how gorgeous you look while you're rescuing me?
And you just had to come check. I'm flattered, sweetheart.
I had everything under control. I was luring these Imperials into a trap... somewhere.
I appreciate you taking time out of your busy schedule. I know how all-consuming saving the galaxy can be.
I'm on my way to face the Emperor. Be careful.
Stay safe, Doc.
I always have time for you.
[Flirt] No problem.
Get ready to clear your schedule, sweetheart. I'm planning a long vacation for us.
I need something to do when this is all over.
[Flirt] You can't die.
It's about time you got here. Staging this thing to get your attention was a lot of work.
When this is over, drinks at the cantina are on me, Doc.
That's what friends are for.
That's good, 'cause I'm broke. This is a great job, but it pays lousy.
So you just pretended to barely tolerate me all this time? You're alright.
Don't get in over your head again. I won't be there to pull you back out.
You're on your own now.
I get it--you've got a date with destiny. But after that, you've got a date with me.
No problem. I can hold my breath a long time. I'll show you sometime.
Oh, come on--what else could go wrong?
Don't worry about me. I'll keep the Imperials running in circles 'til you're done. Tell the Emperor I said goodbye.
I've been to some unfriendly towns, but this one takes the prize.
No turning back now. We're in this up to our necks.
Wish we had time for a private consultation. I'd make sure all your vaccinations are up to date.
We might not come back from this alive. You sure you don't want to surrender to my charms while you still can?
We have to survive this. Think of all the free drinks we'll get at the cantina.
